This item is perfect for champions who need survivability in team fights, especially for tanks and fighters who take frontline positions.
It provides bonuses to maximum health, attack damage, and helps increase your survivability.
The "Lifeline" effect activates when your health drops below 35%, granting a shield that absorbs damage, helping you survive heavy hits.

"Sterak's Fury" empowers you, increases your size, removes crowd control effects (except airborne), and grants 30% tenacity for 4 seconds, allowing you to survive and continue fighting through heavy crowd control and burst damage from enemies.
